lead_paragraph: The State Education Department issued a memorandum to remind school districts to comply with a Supreme Court decision recognizing students’ rights to an education.
snippet: The State Education Department issued a memorandum to remind school districts to comply with a Supreme Court decision recognizing students’ rights to an education.

headline.main: New York Asks Schools to Avoid Pupil Immigration Status
headline.seo: N.Y. Presses Schools Not to Seek Immigration Status
headline.print_headline: State Urges Schools to Avoid Immigration Status of Pupils
